report.title: Record counts by survey with standard params
report.description: A filtered league table of record counts by warehouse user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM people p JOIN users u ON u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false AND u.id<>1 JOIN users_websites uw on uw.user_id=u.id JOIN websites w on w.id=uw.website_id and w.deleted=false JOIN surveys su on su.website_id=uw.website_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.created_by_id=u.id and o.survey_id=su.id and o.website_id=uw.website_id #filters# #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND p.deleted=false
